mapper.sql: genTableColumn.id AS "id", genTableColumn.name AS "name", genTableColumn.comment AS "comment", genTableColumn.field AS "field", genTableColumn.jdbc_type AS "jdbcType", genTableColumn.form_type AS "formType", genTableColumn.query_type AS "queryType", genTableColumn.sort AS "sort", genTableColumn.is_null AS "isNull", genTableColumn.is_insert AS "isInsert", genTableColumn.is_edit AS "isEdit", genTableColumn.is_query AS "isQuery", genTableColumn.is_list AS "isList", genTableColumn.is_key AS "isKey", genTable.id AS "genTable.id", genTable.name AS "genTable.name", genTable.comment AS "genTable.comment", genTable.class_name AS "genTable.className", genTable.parent_table_id AS "genTable.parentTableId", genTable.parent_table_fk AS "genTable.parentTableFk"
LEFT JOIN gen_table genTable ON genTable.id = genTableColumn.gen_table_id

if.test: data.genTable != null and data.genTable.id != null and data.genTable.id != ''

mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gen_table_column
gen_table_id,
name,
comment,
jdbc_type,
field,
is_null,
is_key,
is_insert,
is_edit,
is_list,
is_query,
query_type,
form_type,
sort,
create_by,
create_date,
update_by,
update_date,
remark
VALUES
#{genTable.id},
#{name},
#{comment},
#{jdbcType},
#{field},
#{isNull},
#{isKey},
#{isInsert},
#{isEdit},
#{isList},
#{isQuery},
#{queryType},
#{formType},
#{sort},
#{createBy},
#{createDate},
#{updateBy},
#{updateDate},
#{remark}
mapper.update:
UPDATE gen_table_column
comment = #{comment},
jdbc_type = #{jdbcType},
field = #{field},
is_null = #{isNull},
is_key = #{isKey},
is_insert = #{isInsert},
is_edit = #{isEdit},
is_list = #{isList},
is_query = #{isQuery},
query_type = #{queryType},
form_type = #{formType},
sort = #{sort},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
remark = #{remark}
WHERE id = #{id}
